name: War of Ah-Huk
description:
This project tells a short story of a 16 year old boy named William who is caught in a civil war between two powerful political party's: The FreeBird and The Rising.

William must race back to his house, rescue his family, escape Hyperious city and then leave the country Ah-Huk. 

Will William rescue his family in time?

Find out in this Narrative/walking simulator game!


Controls
WASD: Move
Shift: Sprint
Mouse Movement: look around
